mapper.sql: C.SYS_MENU_ID as menu_id, C.PARENT as parent, C.NAMA as nama, PM.NAMA parent_nama, C.LINK as link, C.LEVEL as level, C.URUT as urut, C.SYS_PATH as path, C.F_AKTIF as f_aktif, C.SYS_USER_CREATE as user_create, C.SYS_TGL_CREATE as tgl_create, C.SYS_JAM_CREATE as jam_create, C.SYS_USER_NONAKTIF as user_nonaktif, C.SYS_TGL_NONAKTIF as tgl_nonaktif, C.SYS_JAM_NONAKTIF as jam_nonaktif, PM.SYS_MENU_ID as pm_menu_id, PM.PARENT as pm_parent, PM.NAMA as pm_nama, PM.LINK as pm_link, PM.LEVEL as pm_level, PM.URUT as pm_urut, PM.SYS_PATH as pm_path, PM.F_AKTIF as pm_f_aktif
select * from ( select from menu C left outer join menu PM on C.parent = PM.sys_menu_id )T

WHERE 1=1 AND ( nama like CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%') OR link like CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%') OR path like CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%') OR user_create like CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%') OR jam_create like CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%') OR user_nonaktif like CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%') OR jam_nonaktif like CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%') )
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO menu ( SYS_MENU_ID, PARENT, NAMA, LINK, LEVEL, URUT, SYS_PATH, F_AKTIF, SYS_USER_CREATE, SYS_TGL_CREATE, SYS_JAM_CREATE, SYS_USER_NONAKTIF, SYS_TGL_NONAKTIF, SYS_JAM_NONAKTIF ) values ( #{menu_id}, #{parent}, #{nama}, #{link}, #{level}, #{urut}, #{path}, #{f_aktif}, #{user_create}, #{tgl_create}, #{jam_create}, #{user_nonaktif}, #{tgl_nonaktif}, #{jam_nonaktif} )
mapper.select: where T.f_aktif=1 order by T.path, T.urut

select child.sys_path,child.parent, parent.nama parent_nama, parent.link parent_link, child.sys_menu_id, child.nama, child.link, child.level, child.urut from menu child INNER JOIN menu parent on child.parent = parent.sys_menu_id and parent.f_aktif=1 where child.f_aktif=1 and exists (select * from sys_akses_menu am where am.group_kd =#{group_kd} and child.f_aktif=1 and menu_id = child.sys_menu_id )
AND not exists (SELECT * from menu WHERE parent = 1 AND sys_menu_id = child.sys_menu_id) and child.parent=#{root}
and child.sys_path like concat(#{path},'%')
order by child.sys_path, child.urut
